column4: hey, this is really weird (for me), i just plugged in my external harddrive and it says unable to mount... and thats that?!  what do i do? please
paste the dmesg | tail's lines relevant to this issue
im sorry, im not sure what u mean...
ok did that, what exactly do u want me to paste?
paste everything actually to rafb.net/paste or similar
ok, please be patient with me... im sure ur gonna grind ur teeth here.. i dont have a clue on what u mean
ok. Go to http://rafb.net/paste
type dmesg | tail
ok did that...
paste us the url so we can look at it!
http://rafb.net/p/ZS0xn632.html
drop to the terminal, sudo mkdir /mnt/flash && sudo mount /dev/sdb2 /mnt/flash
k, one sec
URL: http://rafb.net/p/xXhkvK99.html
congrats, you solved it
hmmmmm one sec... lol
k did that, but it says only root can do that
im sorry for testin ur patience here... im sure that has a simple fix...?

wow, k, so it works, thank you so much again, for ur patience especially.. as u can tell im super new to ubuntu.... thank you so much again -- and that website.. just an online clip board basically then?
np, everyone's a newbie sometime or the other. Yes, the site's an online clipboard
people don't like the channel to be flooded with outputs
cool, well that makes sense
